brief_summary.textblock:
In this retrospective study the investigators will enroll newborns that were born between
      01.01.2010 and 31.12.2012 in Hillel Yaffe Medical Center with the prenatal diagnosis of
      Pyelectasis according to prenatal sonographic screening test.

      These babies underwent renal sonography at the age of 2-5 days according to the protocol and
      were invited to an additional renal sonographic screening test at the age of 1 month.

      The investigators will compare the results of the 2 examinations and the investigators will
      try to reach conclusions whether there is correspondence between the severity of the
      pyelectasis in the first and second sonographic tests and the outcome of these newborn
      babies

clinical_study.brief_title: Sonographic Follow up in Newborns Diagnosed With Prenatal Hydronephrosis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  All newborns that were born at Hillel Yaffe Medical Center with prenatal diagnosis of
             Hydronephrosis between 01.01.2010-31.12.2012

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  None

study_pop.textblock: newborns at the age of 0-1 months

clinical_study.official_title: Sonographic Follow up in Newborns Diagnosed With Prenatal Hydronephrosis

primary_outcome.measure: severity of hydronephrosis by sonographic measures

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Retrospective
